Title: June 2017
Content: 22*p48419a02228*do not write in this areado not write in this areado not write in this area*(c) nicotine is known to stimulate heart rate (paragraph40).(i) nicotine increases heart rate by stimulating adrenaline secretion from cells in the adrenal gland.the sequence of events leading to this adrenaline secretion involves a similar sequence of events that lead to the release of neurotransmitters at a synapse.use this information and your own knowledge to suggest how nicotine stimulates an increase in heart rate.(6)
